TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartVerb extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.IStateManager

summary.span: 提供使用户能在 Web 部件页面上执行操作的交互式用户界面 (UI) 元素。

span.span: Provides an interactive user interface (UI) element that enables users to perform actions on a Web Parts page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件谓词是交互式 UI 元素，通常表示按钮或超链接，在使用 Web 部件控件的页中显示。Web Parts verbs are interactive UI elements, typically represented by buttons or hyperlinks, that appear in pages that use Web Parts controls. 用户可单击谓词来执行常见 UI 操作的 Web 部件控件，如右控件或关闭编辑显示模式 (与关联的特殊页视图控件)。Users click verbs to carry out common UI actions for Web Parts controls, such as closing a control or closing the edit display mode (a special page view associated with the control). 使用 Web 部件区域中提供的 Web 部件控件集的所有标准谓词相关联 (， ， ，或) 或 Web 部件控件 (， ， ，或)。All standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set are associated with either a Web Parts zone (, , , or ) or a Web Parts control (, , , or ). 与区域关联的标准谓词时，在区域级别，应用它们的操作和谓词通常出现在区域的页眉或页脚区域中。When the standard verbs are associated with a zone, their actions apply at the zone level, and the verbs usually appear in the zone's header or footer area. 下表列出了常见区域级别的谓词，并描述其操作。The following table lists the common zone-level verbs and describes their actions. |区域级别谓词Zone-level verb|操作Action| |----------------------|------------| |关闭谓词Close verb|使用继承的区域使用类。Used with zones that inherit from the class. 隐藏 UI 区域，并且通常将页返回到其正常浏览模式视图。Hides the UI for a zone and typically returns the page to its normal browse mode view.| |将应用谓词Apply verb|使用继承的区域使用类。Used with zones that inherit from the class. 应用用户所做的更改。Applies changes that a user has made.| |确定的谓词OK verb|使用继承的区域使用类。Used with zones that inherit from the class. 已应用和关闭谓词; 的组合的效应它将更改应用，并隐藏该区域的 UI。Has the combined effect of the apply and close verbs; it applies changes and hides the zone's UI.| |取消谓词Cancel verb|使用继承的区域使用类。Used with zones that inherit from the class. 取消任何挂起的用户所做的更改。Cancels any pending changes a user has made.| |将谓词添加Add verb|使用继承的区域使用类。Used with zones that inherit from the class. 将用户从控件目录中选择与指定的控件添加区域。Adds a control that a user has selected from a catalog of controls to a specified zone.| |配置谓词Configure verb|使用继承的区域使用类。Used with zones that inherit from the class. 打开一个视图，以使用户能够配置现有的连接。Opens a view to enable users to configure existing connections.| |断开连接谓词Disconnect verb|使用继承的区域使用类。Used with zones that inherit from the class. 两个控件之间的现有连接将终止。Terminates an existing connection between two controls.| 对于与之关联的标准谓词控件，它们的操作将应用于控件本身 （或子控件）。As for the standard verbs that are associated with controls, their actions apply to the control itself (or to its child controls). 部件控件可用作谓词的容器，并管理该谓词的呈现。The part control acts as a container for the verb and manages the rendering of the verb. 大多数标准与部件控件关联的谓词显示通知或直接在标题栏中的标题栏的下拉谓词菜单中。Most standard verbs associated with part controls appear either directly in the title bar or in a drop-down verbs menu within the title bar. 这些谓词显示直接在标头中或谓词菜单中由属性; 默认情况下，谓词在谓词菜单中显示。Whether these verbs appear directly in the header or in a verbs menu is determined by the property; by default, the verbs appear in a verbs menu. 下表列出了与各个关联的常见谓词控件并描述其操作。The following table lists common verbs associated with the various controls and describes their actions. |部分中控制谓词Part control verb|操作Action| |-----------------------|------------| |最大程度减少谓词Minimize verb|中包含每个服务器控件的谓词菜单中显示区域。Appears in the verbs menu of each server control contained in a zone. 减少为最小的表示形式，隐藏除还原谓词其 UI 中的所有内容控件。Reduces the control to a minimal representation, hiding everything in its UI except the restore verb.| |还原谓词Restore verb|中包含每个服务器控件的谓词菜单中显示区域。Appears in the verbs menu of each server control contained in a zone. 最小化的控件返回到其常规大小和视图。Returns a minimized control to its normal size and view.| |关闭谓词Close verb|中包含每个服务器控件的谓词菜单中显示区域。Appears in the verbs menu of each server control contained in a zone. 关闭一个控件，并将其添加到页目录中，这意味着从页中删除控件，但，如果没有正确设计的目录，用户可以重新打开已关闭的控件，并返回到页。Closes a control and adds it to the page catalog, which means the control is removed from the page but, if there is a properly designed catalog, users can reopen the closed control and return it to the page.| |连接谓词Connect verb|中包含的控件的谓词菜单中显示区域，如果页是在连接显示模式和控件可以形成连接。Appears in the verbs menu of a control contained in a zone, if the page is in connect display mode and if the control can form connections. 打开连接用户界面，以便用户可以创建控件之间的连接。Opens a connection UI so that users can create a connection between controls.| |删除谓词Delete verb|中包含的控件的谓词菜单中显示区域，如果控件已添加到页面以编程方式 （而不是持久性格式中声明）。Appears in the verbs menu of a control contained in a zone, if the control was added to the page programmatically (rather than being declared in persistence format). 永久删除的控件实例和任何关联的个性化设置数据，以便与关闭的控件，被删除的实例可以永远不会还原到的页。Permanently deletes the control instance and any associated personalization data so that, unlike a closed control, the deleted instance can never be restored to the page.| |编辑谓词Edit verb|中包含的控件的谓词菜单中显示区域，如果页设计为允许对控件进行编辑和如果该页中编辑显示模式。Appears in the verbs menu of a control contained in a zone, if the page is designed to permit editing of controls and if the page is in edit display mode. 选择要编辑的控件，并打开编辑的用户界面。Selects the control for editing and opens the editing UI.| |导出谓词Export verb|中包含的控件的谓词菜单中显示区域，如果导出已启用的控件和应用程序。Appears in the verbs menu of a control contained in a zone, if the control and application are enabled for export. 将打开一个对话框，使用户能够导出包含该控件的序列化的状态的说明文件。Opens a dialog box that enables users to export a description file that contains the serialized state of the control. 有关详细信息，请参见 属性。For details, see the property.| |帮助谓词Help verb|中包含的控件的谓词菜单中显示区域，如果该控件旨在提供帮助文件。Appears in the verbs menu of a control contained in a zone, if the control is designed to provide a Help file. 启动为控件提供帮助页。Launches a page that provides help for the control.| 除了使用 Web 部件提供的标准谓词控件集，还可以创建自定义谓词。Along with the standard verbs that are provided with the Web Parts control set, you can also create custom verbs. 创建自定义谓词的常见方案是创建与关联的谓词控件。A common scenario for creating custom verbs is to create verbs associated with controls. 在创建这些谓词时，默认情况下它们将显示以及标准谓词的谓词菜单上。When you create these verbs, by default they will appear on the verbs menu along with the standard verbs. 用于创建这种谓词的基本方法是从继承类，以创建一个或多个自定义谓词。The basic approach for creating such verbs is to inherit from the class to create one or more custom verbs. 然后创建继承的控件基本类并添加自定义对象添加到集合。Then create a control that inherits from the base class and add the custom objects to a collection. 然后可以将此集合添加到控件，这将导致显示的自定义谓词自动上的控件的谓词菜单在运行时的集合。This collection can then be added to the collection of the control, which will cause the custom verbs to appear automatically on the control's verbs menu at run time. 如使用标准谓词时，你可以访问自定义的谓词以编程方式在控件。As with the standard verbs, you can access the custom verbs programmatically on a control. Web 部件应用程序可以使用不继承自的服务器控件类，如自定义控件、 用户控件或 ASP.NET 控件。Web Parts applications can use server controls that do not inherit from the class, such as custom controls, user controls, or ASP.NET controls. 如果添加到这些服务器控件区域，动态包装在一起在运行时，这使他们可以用作运行时对象控件。These server controls, if added to a zone, are dynamically wrapped with a object at run time, which enables them to function as run-time controls. 若要将自定义谓词添加到不会继承从一个服务器控件类，服务器控件必须实现接口并重写其属性。To add custom verbs to a server control that does not inherit from the class, the server control must implement the interface and override its property. 当您创建一个谓词时，可以创建两种类型的关联的事件处理程序将运行在用户单击该谓词时： 服务器端事件处理程序 （在服务器运行的代码） 和客户端事件处理程序 （客户端浏览器中运行的代码）。When you create a verb, you can create two types of associated event handlers that will run when a user clicks the verb: a server-side event handler (code that runs on the server), and a client-side event handler (code that runs in the client browser). 此外，可以定义自定义状态为谓词，它是有效的方式向用户提供视觉提示。Also, you can define custom states for verbs, which is a useful way to provide visual cues to users. 例如，您可以创建一个状态指示已选择一个谓词，并提供适当的更改，以通知用户已选择谓词在 UI 中。For example, you could create a state indicating that a verb has been selected, and then provide appropriate changes in the UI to notify the user that the verb is already selected. 另一个有用的行为是能够禁用谓词;通过执行此操作，可以阻止用户单击谓词，如果这样做因此是有害或基于应用程序状态的无效。Another useful behavior is the ability to disable verbs; by doing this, you can prevent users from clicking verbs if doing so would be harmful or ineffective based on the state of the application. 类不公开任何唯一的方法; 其公开的方法的基方法的所有替代。The class does not expose any unique methods; its exposed methods are all overrides of base methods. 但它的确包含多个面向开发人员需要注意的属性。It does however contain a number of properties for developers to be aware of. 属性指示当前是否选定谓词。The property indicates whether a verb is currently selected. 和属性指的类中相应的处理程序 （如果存在） 有关客户端和服务器，请单击事件。The and properties refer to the respective handlers within the class (if any exist) for client and server click events. 属性包含描述用途的工具提示中的谓词时用户将鼠标指针放在 UI 中的谓词的文本。The property contains text that describes the purpose of a verb in a ToolTip when users position a mouse pointer over the verb in the UI. 属性指示谓词，用于确定用户是否可以单击谓词和执行其操作的当前状态。The property indicates the current status of a verb, which determines whether a user can click the verb and execute its action. 属性提供谓词对象的唯一 ID。The property provides a unique ID for the verb object. 属性包含可以用于表示谓词来代替 （通常是按钮或超链接） 的默认呈现 UI 中的图像的 URL。The property contains a URL to an image that can be used to represent a verb in the UI in place of the default rendering (typically a button or a hyperlink). 属性包含直接在 UI 中的谓词显示的标签文本。The property contains the label text that appears directly on the verb in the UI. 重写属性确定在 UI 中当前是否显示了一个谓词。The overridden property determines whether a verb is currently displayed in the UI. 谓词通常是隐藏的或禁用在 Web 部件应用程序; 中的不同时间例如，仅当在页上，若要启用这些谓词进行有意义的操作存在适当的控制、 设置和显示模式时，会显示专业谓词 （如编辑谓词和连接谓词）。Verbs are often hidden or disabled at different times in a Web Parts application; for example, specialty verbs (such as the edit verb and the connect verb) are displayed only when the appropriate controls, settings, and display modes exist on the page to enable those verbs to take meaningful action. 使用谓词的其他关键成员包括方法，即可以被覆盖的谓词创建过程的自定义处理的事件处理程序和事件。Other key members for working with verbs include the method, which is an event handler that can be overridden for custom handling of the verb creation process, and the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义对象，并使用自定义区域方法将谓词添加到每个谓词菜单该区域中包含的控件。The following code example shows how to create a custom object, and a custom zone that uses the method to add the verb to the verbs menu of each control contained in the zone. 有四个部分的代码示例：There are four parts to the code example: - 包含一个简单的自定义的源文件显示一些文本的控件。A source file that contains a simple custom control that displays some text. - 包含一个自定义的源文件对象和一个简单的自定义重写的区域方法添加到自定义的谓词区域中的控件。A source file that contains a custom object, and a simple custom zone that overrides the method to add the custom verb to controls in the zone. - 包含自定义区域和自定义 Web 页控件。A Web page that contains the custom zone and the custom control. - 该示例的工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works. 代码示例的第一部分包含创建一个简单的源代码显示一些文本的控件。The first part of the code example contains source code that creates a simple control that displays some text. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译的方法。This code example uses the dynamic compilation approach. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/SimpleControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/SimpleControl.vb#2)] 该示例的第二部分包含源代码以创建自定义区域和自定义对象。The second part of the example contains source code to create the custom zone and the custom object. 请注意，区域重写方法将自定义谓词添加到任何区域中的控件。Note that the zone overrides the method to add the custom verb to any controls in the zone. 默认情况下，该谓词添加到控件的谓词菜单。The verb is added by default to the verbs menu of the controls. 请注意，在代码中的自定义的谓词，该谓词的构造函数使用服务器单击处理程序，并直接从调用的方法创建的任何控件的完整副本继承类，将新创建的副本添加到同一区域。Note that, in the code for the custom verb, the constructor for the verb uses a server click handler, and that the method called creates a complete copy of any control that inherits directly from the class, adding the newly created copy to the same zone. 如代码示例的第一部分，必须编译此源代码，并在此示例中的源文件被放在 App_Code 子文件夹，用于动态编译。Like the first part of the code example, this source code must be compiled, and in this example the source file was placed in an App_Code subfolder to be dynamically compiled. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/ZoneWithAddedVerb.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/ZoneWithAddedVerb.vb#3)] 代码示例的第三部分是承载控件的网页。The third part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the controls. 请注意，没有`Register`指令要声明的自定义控件的命名空间的页的顶部附近。Note that there is a `Register` directive near the top of the page to declare the namespace of the custom controls. 未设置程序集被声明，因为此示例使用动态编译。No assembly is declared because this example uses dynamic compilation. 自定义控件声明自定义区域内。The custom control is declared within the custom zone. 您也无法声明其他此区域和自定义谓词中的控件将添加到它们的谓词菜单。You could also declare other controls in this zone, and the custom verb would be added to their verbs menus as well. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/Defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#1)] 在浏览器页面加载以及单击自定义的谓词菜单控件。Load the page in a browser, and click the verbs menu on the custom control. **复制 Web 部件**谓词应为可见。The **Copy Web Part** verb should be visible. 单击该谓词，并记下该控件的副本添加到的区域。Click the verb, and note that a copy of the control is added to the zone.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数创建的新实例类通过传入三个可能的参数之一： 具有 ID 字符串，对具有 ID 字符串，一个客户端单击事件处理程序的引用的服务器端单击事件处理程序的引用或对这两种类型的单击事件处理程序。The constructor creates a new instance of the class by passing in one of three possible parameters: a reference to a server-side click event handler with an ID string, a reference to a client-side click event handler with an ID string, or references to both types of click event handlers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类构造函数是指当用户单击用户界面 (UI) 中的谓词时调用的客户端事件处理程序。This class constructor refers to a client-side event handler to call when the user clicks a verb in the user interface (UI).

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and associates both client and server-side click event handlers with the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类构造函数是指当用户单击用户界面 (UI) 中的谓词时调用这两个客户端和服务器端单击事件处理程序。This class constructor refers to both client-side and server-side click event handlers to call when the user clicks a verb in the user interface (UI).

member this.Checked : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示某个与自定义谓词相关联的状态当前是否处于活动状态或被选中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating that some state associated with a custom verb is currently active or selected.

value.span: 如果与自定义谓词相关联的状态当前处于活动状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a state associated with a custom verb is currently active; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与任何 Web 部件控件集提供的标准谓词不使用此属性。This property is not used with any of the standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set. 当它用于自定义谓词，且属性值设置为`true`，旁边以指示谓词的活动状态的谓词显示所选的复选框。When it is used with custom verbs, and the property value is set to `true`, a selected check box appears next to the verb to indicate the active status of the verb. 此属性的目的是为开发人员提供一种，该值指示与谓词相关联的某些自定义状态当前处于活动状态。The purpose of this property is to give developers a way of indicating that some custom state associated with a verb is currently active. 例如，假设开发人员创建自定义的谓词，用于增大上所有的正文文本的文本大小 （用于可访问性目的）区域中的控件。For example, suppose a developer creates a custom verb that enlarges the text size (for accessibility purposes) of the body text on all controls in a zone. 如果用户单击该谓词，无法设置此属性的值为`true`，这可能会导致选中的复选框以显示下一步**增大文本字号**谓词在谓词菜单中，向与关联状态的用户谓词 （放大文本） 处于活动状态。If a user clicks the verb, this property value could be set to `true`, which would cause a selected check box to appear next to the **Increase Text Size** verb in the verbs menu, indicating to users that the state associated with the verb (enlarged text) is active. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可检索处理单击事件的客户端上的谓词的方法的名称。Use this property to retrieve the name of the method that handles click events for the verb on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性获取或设置谓词时用户将鼠标指针定位在谓词显示为工具提示的说明。Use this property to get or set a description of a verb that appears as a ToolTip when a user positions a mouse pointer over the verb. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写属性在派生类继承自。The following code example shows how to override the property in a derived class inheriting from . 此源的代码演示只有自定义区域的代码的部分和重写的属性的类。This source code shows only the portion of the code for the custom zone and the class that overrides the property. 可以在的示例部分中找到要运行该示例所需的代码的其余部分类概述。The rest of the code required to run the example can be found in the Example section of the class overview. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用谓词。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a verb is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用谓词，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the verb is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用谓词。Use this property to get or set a value indicating whether the verb is enabled. 可用于将无法启用或禁用谓词的页面和控件生命周期中给定点。It is useful to be able to enable or disable verbs at given points in the page and control life cycle. 例如，如果开发人员希望阻止用户成为能够关闭出于任何原因，开发人员区域中的控件可以设置上的属性值动词与`false`，，然后将阻止用户关闭该区域中的任何控件。For example, if a developer wants to prevent users from being able to close the controls in a zone for any reason, the developer can set the property value on the verb to `false`, and then users will be prevented from closing any controls within that zone. 默认情况下已禁用的谓词在谓词菜单中有可视提示，例如较浅的文本颜色呈现。By default, disabled verbs are rendered in verbs menus with a visual cue such as a lighter text color. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写属性在派生类继承自。The following code example shows how to override the property in a derived class inheriting from . 此源的代码演示只有自定义区域的代码的部分和重写的属性的类。This source code shows only the portion of the code for the custom zone and the class that overrides the property. 可以在的示例部分中找到要运行该示例所需的代码的其余部分类概述。The rest of the code required to run the example can be found in the Example section of the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/ZoneWithAddedVerb.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/ZoneWithAddedVerb.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置包含一个图像的 URL 的字符串，该图像在用户界面 (UI) 中表示谓词。

span.span: Gets or sets a string containing a URL to an image that represents a verb in the user interface (UI).

value.span: 一个字符串，包含一个图像的 URL。

span.span: A string that contains the URL to an image.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够使用自定义可视表示形式的谓词作为默认的呈现，这通常是一个按钮或超链接的替代方法。The property provides a way to use a customized visual representation for verbs as an alternative to the default rendering, which is typically a button or a hyperlink. 如果 URL 分配给属性时，图像将出现在谓词菜单 （接下来到谓词） 或直接在窗体 （代替按钮或超链接表示该谓词）。If you assign a URL to the property, the image appears in verbs menus (next to the verb) or directly in forms (in place of a button or hyperlink that represents the verb). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写属性在派生类继承自。The following code example shows how to override the property in a derived class inheriting from . 此源的代码演示只有自定义区域的代码的部分和重写的属性的类。This source code shows only the portion of the code for the custom zone and the class that overrides the property. 可以在的示例部分中找到要运行该示例所需的代码的其余部分类概述。The rest of the code required to run the example can be found in the Example section of the class overview. 请注意，示例代码将分配到一个虚构图标属性; 如果您分配的实际的图像或图标，它将出现旁边的谓词菜单中的谓词。Note that the sample code assigns a fictitious icon to the property; if you assign a real image or icon, it will appear next to the verb in the verbs menu. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/ZoneWithAddedVerb.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/ZoneWithAddedVerb.vb#3)]

summary.span: 从用 方法保存的上一个页面请求还原视图状态信息。

span.span: Restores view-state information from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构并不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 此方法确定是否有任何现有`savedState`从上一个页请求，如果是这样，将其还原。This method determines whether there is any existing `savedState` from a previous page request, and if so, restores it. 还原视图状态由的值的谓词的可见性的过程中包括属性。Included in the process of restoring view state is the verb's visibility, which is determined by the value of the property.

span.span: An that contains the state data to be saved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有任何视图状态数据，则此方法将调用基方法，并将数据保存。If there is any view-state data, this method calls the base method and saves the data.

summary.span: 获取或设置显示在用户界面 (UI) 中的谓词的文本标签。

span.span: Gets or sets the text label for a verb that is displayed in the user interface (UI).

value.span: 一个字符串，包含谓词的文本标签。

span.span: A string containing the text label for a verb.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设置的标签文本对象; 它是用户在 UI 中表示谓词的内容。This property sets the text of the label for a object; it is what represents the verb to users in the UI. 如果开发人员 （可选） 将值赋给属性、 图像或图标表示谓词在 UI 中，并且在某些情况下 （例如当谓词通常由按钮或超链接呈现） 图像显示而不是文本标签。If developers (optionally) assign a value to the property, an image or icon represents the verb in the UI, and in certain cases (such as when the verb is normally rendered by a button or hyperlink) the image appears instead of the text label. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写属性在派生类继承自。The following code example shows how to override the property in a derived class inheriting from . 此源的代码演示只有自定义区域的代码的部分和重写的属性的类。This source code shows only the portion of the code for the custom zone and the class that overrides the property. 可以在的示例部分中找到要运行该示例所需的代码的其余部分类概述。The rest of the code required to run the example can be found in the Example section of the class overview. 加载浏览器中的页面后，请注意值分配给的源代码中的属性将显示在谓词菜单的控件。After you load the page in a browser, note that the value assigned to the property in the source code appears in the verbs menu of the control. summary.span: 获取状态信息的字典，这些信息使您可以在同一页的多个请求间保存和还原服务器控件的视图状态。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of state information that allows you to save and restore the view state of a server control across multiple requests for the same page.

value.span: 包含服务器控件视图状态信息的 的实例。

span.span: An instance of that contains the server control's view-state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为对象不会继承自任何类，跟踪视图状态，而它却有多个需要视图状态跟踪页的多个请求间的属性，它实现了其自己的属性来维护视图状态。Because the object does not inherit from any class that tracks view state, and yet it has a number of properties that require view state to be tracked across multiple requests for the page, it implements its own property to maintain view state.

span.span: if the verb is visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 谓词通常需要隐藏或显示具体取决于 Web 部件应用程序的内容。Verbs often need to be hidden or displayed depending on the content of a Web Parts application. 例如，最小化谓词将隐藏控件已最小化，并与之相反，当控件处于非最小化其正常状态时隐藏还原谓词时。For example, the minimize verb is hidden when a control is already minimized, and conversely, the restore verb is hidden when the control is in its normal, non-minimized state. 谓词其属性设置为`false`隐藏的用户，但仍会呈现在页面上，仍然可以以编程方式访问和仍完全参与页面和控件生命周期事件。A verb whose property is set to `false` is hidden from users, but is still rendered on a page, can still be accessed programmatically, and still fully participates in page and control life cycle events. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
